漢羅台文: 到甲一八八五年法國佮清國簽訂天津條約，
台羅: Kàu kah it pat pat ngóo nî Huat-kok kah Tshing-kok tshiam-tīng Thian-tin tiâu-iok,
台羅數字調: kau3 kah4 it4 pat4 pat4 ngoo2 ni5 huat4-kok4 kah4 tshing1-kok4 tshiam1-ting7 thian1-tin1 tiau5-iok4,
白話字: Kàu kah it pat pat ngó͘ nî Hoat-kok kah Chheng-kok chhiam-tēng Thian-tin tiâu-iok,
